name: Pure Mage
description: "Ascend without using fists or a weapon."

name: Pure Warrior
description: Ascend without using a staff, wand or charm.

name: Archivist
description: "Ascend without drinking a potion or reading a scroll."

name: Specialist
description: Enchant an item up to or above +16.

name: Dragonslayer
description: Kill a dragon with a melee attack.

name: Paladin
description: "Ascend without attacking an unaware or fleeing creature."
